Detailed Description

a light-weight 3x3 matrix class

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum bduMat3f::InitialValues
 

Enumeration values:
INITIALIZE_TO_ZERO  Initialize all values to 0.
INITIALIZE_TO_IDENTITY  Initialize to the identity matrix.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

bduMat3f::bduMat3f (   )  [inline]
 

Description:
Default constructor. Matrix values are uninitialized.

bduMat3f::bduMat3f (  InitialValues  initial_values  ) 
 

Description:
Constructor. Matrix values are all initialized based on initial_values parameter, which should be ZERO or IDENTITY.

Parameters:
[in] initial_values - how to initialize matrix values
